block.inferno.charred_log.description: A log block that makes an excellent fuel source.
block.inferno.scorched_earth.description: A soil block capable of growing a host of new plants when fertilized. This block will eventually heal in the rain.
entity.inferno.shining_oak_chest_raft.de: A single-passenger vehicle that has its own storage.
entity.inferno.shining_oak_raft.descript: A two-passenger vehicle for traversing rivers and oceans.
